org.jetel.util

Class CTLMapping

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.util.CTLMapping

  • public class CTLMapping
extends java.lang.Object
    This utility class wraps ordinary CTL transformation to make it more handy and useful mainly for various input/output mapping of jobflow components. This class takes CTL transformation code, input records metadata and output records metadata. Optionally default output values can be specified and star-map which is used in case CTL code is not specified. In case CTL transformation is not specified, defined star-map is used instead. All output data records in initialization time are preserved for future usage. These values are considered as default values and all output records are populated by these values before each mapping execution. Expected method invocation order: - constructor - addInputMetadata(String, DataRecordMetadata) or addInputRecord(String, DataRecord) - addOutputMetadata(String, DataRecordMetadata) or addOutputRecord(String, DataRecord) - setDefaultOutputValue(String, String, Object) - addAutoMapping(String, String) - setTransformation(String) - #setClasspath(CloverClassPath) - #setClassLoader(ClassLoader) - #init() - preExecute() - execute() - postExecute() - #free()

      • setOutputSetDefaults

        public void setOutputSetDefaults(boolean outputSetDefaults)
        By default, output records will be filled with default values taken from the output record used in initialization.
        Parameters:
        outputSetDefaults - Setting this to false will disable this behavior - no default values will be set.

      • init

        public void init(java.lang.String xmlAttribute,
        CTLMapping.MissingRecordFieldMessage... missingFieldChecks)
          throws ComponentNotReadyException
        CTL mapping initialization can be called only once. Output records content at the time is considered as default output.
        Parameters:
        xmlAttribute - name of the attribute that contains the source of the transformation
        missingFieldChecks - error messages for individual input and output records
        Throws:
        ComponentNotReadyException
        See Also:
        CTLMapping.MissingRecordFieldMessage

      • execute

        public int execute()
        Performs the mapping. Default values are copied into output records and either ctl transformation or simple star-mapping is performed.
        Returns:
        result of CTL transformation (see RecordTransform#) or RecordTransform.ALL for star-mapping is returned

        field - output field of interest (needs to be field of @param record)
